name: FRUCOM - European Federation of the Trade in Dried Fruit, Edible Nuts, Processed Fruit & Vegetables, Processed Fishery Products, Spices and Honey
goal:
FRUCOM pursues the following objectives:

- To bring together importers, agents, brokers and other traders in Dried Fruit, Edible Nuts, Processed Fruit & Vegetables, Processed Fishery Products, Spices, Honey and Similar Foodstuffs within a common organisation in order to facilitate and promote the activities of and cooperation among operators at European level;

- To represent, defend and promote at EU level the general interests of the sector and the common interests of FRUCOM members (national associations of traders in Dried Fruit, Edible Nuts, Processed Fruit & Vegetables, Processed Fishery Products, Spices or Honey).

To attain these objectives, FRUCOM undertakes the following activities:

- Monitor and circulation of information to FRUCOM members on the EU legislation and policy developments in the fields of: international trade, agriculture, food safety, fisheries and customs.

- Permanent link with the institutions of the European Union, the key decision-makers at EU level and other trade associations in the agri-foodstuffs sector, as well as, where necessary, with any other competent international body, with a view to representing and defending the professional interests of all its Members;

- Coordination of actions by its Members and adoption of positions on all matters of common interest in the name of the trade in Dried Fruit, Edible Nuts, Processed Fruit & Vegetables, Processed Fishery Products, Spices, Honey or Similar Foodstuffs;

- Networking platform where FRUCOM members can meet and exchange views;

- Promoting the visibility of the sector at European level.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
DG Trade: rules trade preferences (GSP, GSP+, FTA, EPA), graduation, tariffs, quotas, duties, negociations with third countries, CN codes
DG SANTE: Contaminants, pesticides, additives maximum levels and controls, hygiene rules, rules on health certificates /Labelling rules/Official controls legislation/Traceability
TAXUD: modernisation customs codes, origin certification, anti-dumping rules
MARE: IUU, fish labelling
DG AGRI: quality standards, Organic legislation
